data.message: Is there a setting to not allow tagging at all?..There used to be, but I can't find it. I do not like tagging..It feels like a surprise attack..

replies.message: Hi Sandra. You can actually dismiss or approve tags from other people using these tips from our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1y5iqTP. We hope that helps! -Rose

Reviewing tags is a serious pain. I'd prefer to be able to block others from tagging me in the first place.

Ideally, I could either selectively block individuals from being able to tag me (like, say, my brother who keeps tagging me in 30 pictures a day, despite multiple requests to stop), or block anyone from tagging me at all.

As it stands, either I have to unfriend/block someone, or sift through dozens of tags per day. Neither is a palatable option.
